instruction: Generate a SQL query based on the request.
input: Find all customers from the 'customers' table who made purchases over $1000 in the last 30 days.
output:
SELECT DISTINCT c.*
FROM customers c
JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id
WHERE o.total_amount > 1000
AND o.order_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY);
